articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Chloe Zhao's historic Academy Awards win all but ignored in China - ABC News
articles.description: Zhao is the first Asian woman to win Best Director for her film Nomadland, but in China the reaction has been tightly controlled, with praise removed from social media and supporters blocked from watching a livestream of the event.
articles.content:
The reaction to Chinese director Chloe Zhao's historic night at the Academy Awards has been surprisingly muted back home amid controversy over comments she made nearly a decade ago.

articles.description: Filipina fencer Samantha Catantan fell short of securing a spot in the Tokyo Olympics at the Asia-Oceania qualifiers held in Tashkent, Uzbekistan.

articles.title: Singaporean fencer Amita Berthier earns Olympic spot after winning qualification tournament - CNA
articles.description: SINGAPORE: Amita Berthier has booked her place at this year's Olympic Games, after winning the women's foil event at the Asia-Oceanian Olympic Qualification Tournament in Tashkent, Uzbekistan on Sunday (Apr 25).

articles.title: Philippines logs 8,162 new Covid-19 cases, total nears 1 million - Sify News
